title: Melissa Joan Hart And Amy Seimetz: Multi Multi-Hyphenates
description: Melissa Joan Hart shares her experience remaking The Watcher in the Woods, and Amy Seimetz tells us about adapting The Girlfriend Experience. This episode originally aired on Sept. 29, 2017.
